titleStmt.title: An humble remonstrance to the High Court of Parliament, by a dutifull sonne of the Church
titleStmt.author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.

titleStmt.title: An humble remonstrance to the High Court of Parliament, by a dutifull sonne of the Church
titleStmt.author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M[iles] F[lesher] for Nathaniel Butter in Pauls Church-yard at the pyde-Bull neare St. Austins gate,

notesStmt.note: Dutifull sonne of the Church = Joseph Hall.
The publication year is given according to Lady Day dating.

B3r has catchword "hath". F4r has a 2.5mm gap between the "g" in "righteous" and the "I" in "FINIS". Variant: the gap is 1mm (a resetting found in most copies of STC 12676). Other sheets from STC 12676 may be found mixed in.
Reproductions of the originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery and the British Library.
